markdown_tweet:
~95% of all e-mail goes through the servers of the top ten e-mail providers. Unencrypted. What does that mean for privacy?  
*[@MailpileTeam](https://twitter.com/MailpileTeam), [Wed, 02 Aug 2017 21:22](https://twitter.com/MailpileTeam/status/892858263682854914)*
tweet: ~95% of all e-mail goes through the servers of the top ten e-mail providers. Unencrypted. What does that mean for privacy?
html_tweet:
~95% of all e-mail goes through the servers of the top ten e-mail providers. Unencrypted. What does that mean for privacy?
@MailpileTeam, Wed, 02 Aug 2017 21:22
expanded_tweet: ~95% of all e-mail goes through the servers of the top ten e-mail providers. Unencrypted. What does that mean for privacy?

[https://www.mailpile.is/](/) finally mirrors our tweets! We only display static tweet content (no widgets) so Twitter cannot track visits.
